isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - RELAY VALVE (BENDIX R-12 AND R-14) - MAINTENANCE

step1.para: Every three months, 25,000 miles (40,000 km) or 900 operating hours, check for proper operation.

Every twelve months, 100,000 miles (160,000 km) or 3600 operating hours, disassemble valve and clean parts with mineral spirits. Replace all rubber parts and any part worn or damaged. Check for proper operation before placing vehicle in service.
